description:
About the Role: Vice President of Sales

Location: Fully remote, but we would really like to see someone who is open to traveling across the US. There is a HQ over on the East Coast. Keep that in mind when thinking of applying.

Compensation: Range based on experience, but looking at 130+ base salary. Stock options are offered.
• Please note that we can only accept US Citizens at this time*

Hey Everyone! We are looking for a VP of Sales to come join a growing hardware/software company that focuses on tracking a client's company data, equipment, and much more. They work with clients like GE, John Deere, Boeing, and Northrup Gruman.

As the Vice President of Sales, you will play a pivotal role in leading and scaling the sales efforts to drive revenue growth. You will be responsible for developing and executing sales strategies, building, and leading a high-performance sales team, and fostering key relationships with clients.

Here are some responsibilities that you'll have:
• Build and expand the book of business. Company sells an Enterprise solution - Fortune 500 focus.
• Work cross functionally with Product and Marketing to determine best go-to-market strategies for the coming year for the current tech sales team.
• Create outreach tactics and best practices the sales team will follow
• Travel to trade shows and conferences to help expand the business. You will also travel to client sites.
• Perform market research to determine proper revenue goals for the team

Here's what we'd like to see:
• 15+ years of Hunting/Business Development experience
• Experience in technical selling, solution selling, or product. (Does not need to be focused in manufacturing or networking, but is preferred)
• Excellent communication skills
• Ability to travel at least 30% to 40% a year
• Proven success breaking into Fortune 500 accounts consistently

Reperio Human Capital acts as an Employment Agency and an Employment Business.
